record.dc:title: 159BN74 Cherry, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 84BN46, 47, 48 and 49. Burial 46, indeterminate adult on left side, fully flexed, head SE. Burial 47, adult female, part of double burial, head SE, on left side, fully flexed with Burial 48. Burial 48, adult male with head NW on left side, fully flexed. Burial 49, adult dog, head SE on stomach. Stratum I, bottom. Squares 19R14-15. Direction West.
record.wpa:narrative: [84BN46] Indeterminate adult in fair condition, fully flexed on left side, head to SE. Typical. [84BN47] Adult female in good condition, fully flexed on left side, head to NW. Other unit of a double burial. [84BN48] Adult male in good condition, fully flexed on left side with head to NW. Good burial. [84BN49] Indeterminate adult dog in good condition, partly flexed on stomach with head to SE. Good pup - with the Indians.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has illustrations of burials on file.
